unnormalised: **Manufacturing & Supply Chain: Inventory Forecasting Gets a Boost**
normalised: **Manufacturing and Supply Chain: Inventory Forecasting Gets a Boost**

unnormalised: Mumbai, Oct 26 - Indian manufacturers are increasingly leveraging advanced inventory forecasting techniques to optimize supply chains and reduce operational costs ahead of the peak festive season. A recent study by IIM Bangalore indicates that companies implementing AI-powered forecasting saw a 15% reduction in excess inventory.
